A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: great special effects\, horrible story.  Honestly\, consider this as a teenage boy watching the 4\,5\,6 I wanted to be Luke.... Who would a teen age boy want to be from The Last Jedi?  The EMO dark guy? The Rage dude? the Guy the spent the whole movie trying to undermine the leaders?  The guy that is a coward and is trying to escape?.... That's it for male figures.  Throw 50% of the population (the same ones that are majority SF fans) and have at least one man hero.
